Proposition. If [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^ n \rightarrow \mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline] is a linear transformation with standard matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline], then the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is the span of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline]. (This is sometimes also called the column space of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline].)
